Blackstorm:

She nodded and said "Please,  be careful... if someone knows what're 
you telling me you will be in danger, I told you that 'cause you 
seems be sincere with me..."



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Hevn::
>        He stands up from where he was sitting and walks around the 
table to 
> sit right next to Blackstorm.  He puts his hand on her shoulder 
comfortingly. 
>  "You can't remember your past because you were reprogrammed when 
you were 
> captured.  As for people finding out why I'm here... well, Flicker 
already 
> knows.  At least he knows more or less.  Wherever you decide to 
go, I'll be 
> there."  He squeezes her shoulder gently and looks into her eyes.
